mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FKART_TABLE (FNUM, FNAME, FMOOD ,FPRICE,DELETEYN) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(A.FNUM), 0) + 1 AS CHABUN FROM FKART_TABLE A), #{fname}, #{fmood}, #{fprice}, 'Y' )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.FNUM FNUM ,A.FNAME FNAME ,A.FMOOD FMOOD ,A.FPRICE FPRICE ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN
FROM FKART_TABLE A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y'
ORDER BY 1 DESC
